channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.8-rc.1)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.8-rc.1)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.8-rc.1 - 2023-10-20 # Fixed # warning about VRCTestMarker when Build & Test #628 1.5.7 - 2023-10-19 # 1.5.7-beta.1 - 2023-10-19 # Added # Add compatibility for VRCQuestTools #619 Fixed # AutoFreezeBlendShape will freeze BlendShapes with editor value instead of animated constant #622 1.5.6 - 2023-10-17 # 1.5.6-rc.1 - 2023-10-17 # Removed # Error for Read/Write Mesh off Mesh #615 Since AAO creates Mesh every time, no more error is required!
